name: Thieves Guild Tycoon
description:
Version 1.3 Now Live!


As the Guild Master of a fallen Thieves Guild... you must level up your skills, hire master thieves, protect your vault from raiders, rescue your captured brethren before they squeal on you and bring your guild back to prominence!

Only in "Thieves Guild Tycoon!"


Thieves Guild Tycoon was a project we started and absolutely fell in love with. We plan on continuous updates with a new Trello shortly so the public can follow along as we add new features, enemies, towers, songs, locations, and a whole lot more.


Follow us on twitter @ThievesGuildDev

or @BillySlang

and our Facebook Page: http://on.fb.me/1TQ1VoI


*Patch Notes Included In Game File
